title: Lovely 1911 Craftsman Home with Garden, Rent $2850
posting_body: Looking for tenants who want a home to love, that is well loved.
Our children were raised here and we love this home.
Beautiful 1911 craftsman bungalow, one of original turn of century farmhouses in area when it was all cow pasture.
Still has original gum wood paneling, craftsman trim and built-ins, even an ice closet!
Wall-to-wall carpeting, free-standing gas fireplace, modernized bathroom and kitchen (refrigerator, gas stove, marble counters), washer/dryer.
Deep, partially landscaped yard with six fruit trees (pear, fig, loquat, lemon, and two apples), deck and furniture, one of best microclimates for San Francisco.
The backyard deck and front porch are great places to sip your morning coffee and enjoy the great view of San Francisco.
Easy access to public transportation, close to shops, restaurants, Alemany Farmers Market, and John McLaren Park.
Special Move-in: First and last Month's rent plus security deposit.
No rent increase for first year.
Available Saturday, August 13th, rent prorated this month.
No dogs due to negative experience with previous tenants.
No smoking, no drugs, or illegal activity.
